title: Business shutdowns extended into May around the Washington region amid signs that steps are helping slow coronavirus spread - The Washington Post

content:
The additional restrictions came as Hogan and his regional counterparts cautiously broached the subject of life on the other side of the social shutdown that has gripped residents since mid-March.
